Source.Name: libwandio
Source.Summary: An API for reading and writing to files using a variety of compression methods.
Source.Description: Libwandio is a software library written in C that provides an API for transparently reading from and writing to files using a variety of supported compression methods.

Package.Name: libwandio
Package.Summary: An API for reading and writing to files using a variety of compression methods.
Package.Description: Libwandio is a software library written in C that provides an API for transparently reading from and writing to files using a variety of supported compression methods.
